en.title: Community Partners
en.description: Organizations working with us to advance ecological civilization.

zh.title: 社区伙伴
zh.description: 与我们合作推进生态文明的组织。

connection.en: Supporting community-led reforestation projects across rural China.
connection.zh: 支持中国农村社区主导的植树造林项目。

connection.en: Preserving traditional farming practices and local ecological knowledge.
connection.zh: 保护传统农业实践和当地生态知识。

connection.en: Training new generations in traditional building techniques that work with nature.
connection.zh: 培训新一代掌握与自然和谐相处的传统建筑技术。
